text: Phintella pygmaea is a jumping spider species that lives in China. The species was originally placed in the genus Euophrys by Wanda Wesołowska in 1981, but was transferred to the genus Phintella in 2000. Only the female has been described. ==References== Category:Salticidae Category:Spiders of China Category:Spiders described in 1981 Category:Taxa named by Wanda Wesołowska
title: Phintella pygmaea
